Column.Name: Wizard - Process Properties
Column.Formula:
IF( [Setup Complete] <> TRUE, ( LET $disableValidation := FALSE;
LET $docProvided := OR( AND(HASH_GET([Global Settings], "Document Upload") == TRUE, EBMS_GET_EFORMRECORD_ATTACHMENT_COUNT(EFormType, RecordID , "Contract Documents") > 0), AND(HASH_GET([Global Settings], "External EDRMS") == TRUE, NOT(ISBLANK([Contract Location]))) );
LET $enabledDetails := [Wizard - Additional Information];
LET $processData := HASH( "Start", HASH( "Display Name", "Type",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Type] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Type", "Message", "Please specify a contract arrangement type")), IF(AND([Type] = "Subcontract", [Head Agreement RecordID] = NULL), HASH("Error ID", "Head Agreement RecordID", "Message", "Please select a parent head agreement for this subcontract")), IF([Contract Type] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Contract Type", "Message", "Please specify a contract type")), IF(AND([Restricted] == TRUE, [Reason for Restriction] = NULL), HASH("Error ID", "Reason for Restriction", "Message", "Please provide a reason for restricting access to this contract")) ),
"Completion", AND( [Type] <> NULL, OR([Type] <> "Subcontract", [Head Agreement RecordID] <> NULL), [Contract Type] <> NULL, OR([Restricted] <> TRUE, [Reason for Restriction] <> NULL) ) ),
"High Level Details", HASH( "Display Name", "Overview",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Contract Title] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Contract Title", "Message", "Please enter a title for this contract")), IF([Contract Summary] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Contract Summary", "Message", "Please enter a summary for this contract")), IF([Contract Number] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Contract Number", "Message", "Please specify a contract number")), IF([Department] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Department", "Message", "Please select a department for this contract")),
//Disclosure IF( AND( HASH_GET([Contract Module Settings], "Contract Disclosure Required Visibility") = "Visible", [Contract Disclosure Required] == NULL ), HASH("Error ID", "Disclosure", "Message", "Please specify whether disclosure is required") ), //Disclosure Reason IF( AND( [Contract Disclosure Required] == FALSE, [Reason for Non-disclosure] = NULL, HASH_GET([Contract Module Settings], "Contract Disclosure Required Visibility") = "Visible" ), HASH("Error ID", "Disclosure Reason", "Message", "Please specify why disclosure is not required") ), //Document Validation IF(AND([Document Upload Required] = TRUE, $docProvided <> TRUE), HASH("Error ID", "Contract Document", "Message", "Please upload or provide a reference to the contract document")) ),
"Completion", AND( [Contract Title] <> NULL, [Contract Summary] <> NULL, [Contract Number] <> NULL, [Department] <> NULL, ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "High Level Details") > 0, OR([Document Upload Required] <> TRUE, $docProvided = TRUE) ) ),
"Vendor", HASH( "Display Name", IF([Type] = "Head Agreement", "Subcontracts", [Second Party]),
"Validation", ARRAY( IF( AND([Type] <> "Head Agreement", [Vendor RecordID] = NULL), HASH("Error ID", "Vendor", "Message", "Please provide all the " & [Second Party] & " details") ) ),
"Completion", AND( OR(AND([Type] = "Head Agreement", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "Vendor") > 0), AND([Type] <> "Head Agreement", [Vendor RecordID] <> NULL)), ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "Vendor") > 0 ) ),
"Procurement Details", HASH( "Display Name", "Establishment",
"Validation", ARRAY( //IF([Procurement Reference] = NULL,HASH("Error ID", "Procurement Reference", "Message", "Please provide a reference to the market request for this contract")) ),
"Completion", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "Procurement Details") > 0 ),
"Value", HASH( "Display Name", IF([Type] = "Head Agreement", "Budget", "Value"),
"Validation", ARRAY( IF( AND([Type] <> "Head Agreement", [Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] < 0), HASH("Error ID", "Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax", "Message", "Please provide the initial value for this contract exclusive of tax") ) ),
"Completion", AND( OR(AND([Type] = "Head Agreement", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "Value") > 0), [Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] >= 0), ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "Value") > 0 ) ),
"Duration", HASH( "Display Name", "Duration",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Start Date] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Start Date", "Message", "Please provide the start date for this contract")), IF([Perpetual] == NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Perpetual", "Message", "Please specify if this contract will automatically roll over")), IF(AND([Perpetual] == FALSE, [Original End Date] = NULL), HASH("Error ID", "Original End Date", "Message", "Please provide the initial end date for this contract")), IF(AND([Perpetual] == FALSE, [Original End Date] <= [Start Date]), HASH("Error ID", "Original End Date", "Message", "Please provide a valid initial end date for this contract")) ),
"Completion", AND( [Start Date] <> NULL, OR([Perpetual] = TRUE, AND([Original End Date] <> NULL, [Original End Date] > [Start Date])), ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "Duration") > 0 ) ),
"Roles", HASH( "Display Name", "Roles",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Contract Manager] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Contract Manager", "Message", "Please assign a Contract Manager for this contract")) ),
"Completion", AND([Contract Manager] <> NULL, ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "Roles") > 0) ),
"Additional Information", HASH( "Display Name", "Other details",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF(AND(ARRAY_INDEXOF($enabledDetails, "Risks") > 0, [Wizard - Risks Complete] <> TRUE), HASH("Error ID", "Risks", "Message", "Please confirm all known risks have been logged for this contract")), IF(AND(ARRAY_INDEXOF($enabledDetails, "Questionnaire Data") > 0, [Supplementary Data RecordID] = NULL), HASH("Error ID", "Questionnaire Data", "Message", "Please view and provide values for any custom reporting fields required for this contract")), IF( //mandatory question not answered AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF($enabledDetails, "Questionnaire Data") > 0, [Supplementary Data RecordID] <> NULL, ARRAY_LENGTH(DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Questionnaire", "([Mandatory] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Answer] IS EMPTY AND [Answer Type] <> 'Image')" & " OR " & "([Mandatory] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Image Attached to Reference] FAST_EQUAL_TO NULL AND [Answer Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Image')" & " AND [RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Supplementary Data RecordID]) )) > 0 ), HASH("Error ID", "Questionnaire Mandatory Data", "Message", "Please provide values for all mandatory custom reporting fields.") ), ),
"Completion", AND( OR(ARRAY_INDEXOF($enabledDetails, "Risks") = NULL, [Wizard - Risks Complete] == TRUE), OR(ARRAY_INDEXOF($enabledDetails, "Questionnaire Data") = NULL, [Supplementary Data RecordID] <> NULL), ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "Additional Information") > 0, ARRAY_LENGTH(DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Questionnaire", "([Mandatory] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Answer] IS EMPTY AND [Answer Type] <> 'Image')" & " OR " & "([Mandatory] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Image Attached to Reference] FAST_EQUAL_TO NULL AND [Answer Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Image')" & " AND [RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Supplementary Data RecordID]) )) = 0 ) ),
"Approval", HASH( "Display Name", "Approval",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Approval to Initiate Contract Complete] <> TRUE, HASH("Error ID", "Approval", "Message", "Approval is required to finalise contract setup")) ),
"Completion", [Approval to Initiate Contract Complete] = TRUE, ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "Approval") > 0 ),
"Finish", HASH( "Display Name", "Confirm",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF(AND(HASH_GET([Contract Module Settings], "Contract Approval Required") = TRUE, [Approval to Initiate Contract Complete] <> TRUE), HASH("Error ID", "Approval", "Message", "Approval is required to finalise contract setup")) ),
"Completion", AND( OR(HASH_GET([Contract Module Settings], "Contract Approval Required") <> TRUE, [Approval to Initiate Contract Complete] = TRUE), ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard - Questions Accessed], "Finish") > 0 ) )
);
LET $transformed := ARRAY_SELECT( HASH_KEYS($processData), $(p, processKey) ( LET $processInformation := HASH_GET($processData, $processKey); LET $completionRules := HASH_GET($processInformation, "Completion"); LET $validationRules := HASH_GET($processInformation, "Validation"); LET $displayName := HASH_GET($processInformation, "Display Name");
LET $validationRules := ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_SELECT( $validationRules, $(i, item) IF($disableValidation <> TRUE, $item) ), $(i, item) $item <> NULL );
LET $displayName := COALESCE($displayName, $processKey);
RETURN INDEXES_TO_KEYS( ARRAY($displayName, $completionRules, $validationRules), ARRAY("Display Name", "Completion", "Validation"), ) ) );
RETURN INDEXES_TO_KEYS( $transformed, HASH_KEYS($processData) ) ) )

Label.Text: Hover over the information icon beside each button for further information on each function. Unless specified, these events will not save when triggered.

Information.Text: Marks the setup wizard as complete and registers the contract. Functionally this behaves like the "Finish" button on Contract setup, but ignores all validation. Saves on completion.
Information.WindowContent: Marks the setup wizard as complete and registers the contract. Functionally this behaves like the "Finish" button on Contract setup, but ignores all validation. Saves on completion.

Information.Text: Populates the Contract Manager, Owner, and Sponsor roles based on the values in the Imported Contract Manager/Owner/Sponsor fields. This is only applicable if those fields are populated, i.e. if this is an imported Contract.
Information.WindowContent: Populates the Contract Manager, Owner, and Sponsor roles based on the values in the Imported Contract Manager/Owner/Sponsor fields. This is only applicable if those fields are populated, i.e. if this is an imported Contract.

Information.Text: This event triggers all of the data update events from below. Saves on completion.
Information.WindowContent: This event triggers all of the data update events from below. Saves on completion.

Information.Text: Updates the "Description" column. Formula is "[Contract Number] - [Contract Title] (Vendor Name)".
Information.WindowContent: Updates the "Description" column. Formula is "[Contract Number] - [Contract Title] (Vendor Name)".

Information.Text: Updates the financial fields on the contract, including the amount of tax applicable to the Contract, the initial value including tax, and the value of any variations/extensions approved under the Contract. If "Auto-Populate Expenditure to Date" is enabled under module settings, the Expenditure to Date will also be calculated.
Information.WindowContent: Updates the financial fields on the contract, including the amount of tax applicable to the Contract, the initial value including tax, and the value of any variations/extensions approved under the Contract. If "Auto-Populate Expenditure to Date" is enabled under module settings, the Expenditure to Date will also be calculated.

Information.Text: Updates the Contract Manager/Owner/Sponsor details based on the data in the Individual in Role column. Useful if manual changes need to be applied to the roles or data (e.g. display name) is missing.
Information.WindowContent: Updates the Contract Manager/Owner/Sponsor details based on the data in the Individual in Role column. Useful if manual changes need to be applied to the roles or data (e.g. display name) is missing.

Information.Text: Updates the vendor contact and compliance data stored on the contract. If linked contact/compliance data is not being displayed on the summary, this will refresh it.
Information.WindowContent: Updates the vendor contact and compliance data stored on the contract. If linked contact/compliance data is not being displayed on the summary, this will refresh it.

RichLabel.Text:
<html>
<head>
	<title></title>
</head>
<body>
<style type="text/css">/* CSS talk bubble */
.talk-bubble {
	margin: 40px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
	width: 200px;
	height: auto;
	background-color: lightyellow;
}
.border{
  border: 8px solid #666;
}
.round{
  border-radius: 30px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 30px;
	-moz-border-radius: 30px;

}

/* Right triangle placed top left flush. */
.tri-right.border.left-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, left side slightly down */
.tri-right.border.left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 30px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;

	width: 0;

RichLabel.Text:
You can manually change the status of this contract. On setting a new contract status, the following will occur in addition to the status change:

  • Active: If the contract start date is after today's date, the start date will be changed to today's date.
  • Cancelled: The contract's end date will be set to today's date.
  • Closed: The contract's end date will be set to today's date.
  • Expired: No additional changes.

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE
WHEN [Status] = 'Setup' THEN '#d5ecff'
WHEN [Status] = 'Contract Closed' THEN '#acacac'
WHEN [Status] = 'Terminated' THEN '#acacac'
WHEN [Status] = 'Cancelled' THEN '#ffa8a8'
WHEN [Status] = 'Expired' THEN '#ffa8a8'
ELSE '#d5ecff' END

LET $controlHeight := 6 * 10; LET $controlWidth := 54 * 20; LET $selectedStageColour := "#4682B4"; LET $notselectedStageColour := "#304a60"; LET $disabledColour := "#d5d1d1";
LET $verticalPadding := $controlHeight / 4; LET $numberOfStages := ARRAY_LENGTH(HASH_KEYS([Wizard Questions]));
RETURN " <style>
.core-chevron-navigation li div span { " & IF( $numberOfStages = 1, "padding-left: 60px;",
AND($numberOfStages >= 2, $numberOfStages <= 4), "padding-left: 35px;",
AND($numberOfStages >= 5, $numberOfStages <= 7), "padding-left: 25px;",
$numberOfStages >= 8, "padding-left: 5px; font-size: 13px;" ) & " }
.core-chevron-navigation li { flex: 100%; padding: 1px;" &
IF( $numberOfStages <= 3, "margin: 0 0 0 -65px;",
$numberOfStages = 4, "margin: 0 0 0 -50px;",
AND($numberOfStages >= 5, $numberOfStages <= 7), "margin: 0 0 0 -23px;",
$numberOfStages >= 8, "margin: 0 0 0 -18px;" ) &
IF( $numberOfStages <= 3, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 86% 0%, 96% 50%, 86% 100%, 1% 100%);",
$numberOfStages = 4, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 86% 0%, 96% 50%, 86% 100%, 1% 100%);",
$numberOfStages >= 5, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(10% 50%, 0% 0%, 87% 0%, 97% 50%, 87% 100%, 0% 100%);" ) & " } .core-chevron-navigation li:last-child { " & IF( $numberOfStages = 1, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, calc(100% - 6px) 0%, calc(100% - 6px) 50%, calc(100% - 6px) 100%, 1% 100%); text-align: center;",
$numberOfStages = 2, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, calc(100% - 3px) 0%, calc(100% - 3px) 50%, calc(100% - 3px) 100%, 1% 100%);",
$numberOfStages = 3, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 50%, 100% 100%, 1% 100%);",
$numberOfStages = 4, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 50%, 100% 100%, 1% 100%);",
$numberOfStages >= 5, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(10% 50%, 0% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 50%, 100% 100%, 0% 100%);" ) & " } </style> "

RichLabel.Text:
<style type="text/css">.core-process-icon-container{
  background: white; 
  border-radius: 100%; 
  border: 3px solid;
  padding: 5px; 
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
.core-chevron-navigation
{
  padding-inline-start: 10px;
  font-weight: bold; 
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 100%;
  font-size: 16px;
}
.core-chevron-navigation li
{
  text-decoration: none;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .selected
{
  color: #1E70B5; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation .selected div
{
  color: #1E70B5;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .notselected div
{ 
  color: black;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .disabled div
{
  background: #f8f9fa !important; 
  color: #bcbcbc; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation li div span
{
  padding-top: 17px; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation li:hover
{
  cursor: pointer; 
}
.core-chevron-navigation li div{
  height: 100%; 
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 4px;
}
.core-process-container
{
  display: inline-flex; 
  position: relative; 
  width: 100%; 
}
.core-process-svg-container div
{
  width: 100%; 
  height: 100%; 
}
.core-process-navigation {
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  position: relative;
  margin: 0;
  height: 100%;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding-inline-start: 0px;
  text-align: center; 
}
.core-process-line-dot {
  border-color: transparent;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background: none;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 5px; 
}
.core-process-navigation li {
  flex: 100%;
}
.core-line-between-processes
{
  z-index: 2; 
  height: 2px; 
  position: absolute; 
  width: 50%; 
  top: 14px;
}
.core-process-svg-container
{
  padding-left: 50%; 
  margin-left: -16px; 
  z-index: 2;
  height: 30px; 
  width: 30px;
  cursor: pointer; 
}
.core-process-text-container
{
  z-index: 2;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #1E70B5;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px;
}
</style>

LET $validationData := ARRAY( HASH("ErrorID", "Vendor", "Message", IF([Temp Vendor RecordID] = NULL, "Please provide all the " & [Second Party] & " details for this subcontract")),

RETURN

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK([Original End Date])), [Original End Date] > [Start Date] ), ARRAY_INDEX(DATEDIFF_PARTS(DATEADD("day", 1, [Original End Date]), [Start Date]), 1),
ARRAY_INDEX(DATEDIFF_PARTS([Original End Date], [Start Date]), 1) )

IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK([Original End Date])), [Original End Date] > [Start Date] ), ARRAY_INDEX(DATEDIFF_PARTS(DATEADD("day", 1, [Original End Date]), [Start Date]), 2),
ARRAY_INDEX(DATEDIFF_PARTS([Original End Date], [Start Date]), 2) )

IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK([Original End Date])), [Original End Date] > [Start Date] ), ARRAY_INDEX(DATEDIFF_PARTS(DATEADD("day", 1, [Original End Date]), [Start Date]), 3),
ARRAY_INDEX(DATEDIFF_PARTS([Original End Date], [Start Date]), 3) )

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE -- all system users can read WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' THEN TRUE
-- users in 'read all' group can read WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- vendors can read if the settings are appropriate
WHEN [Setup Complete] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Vendor Access Supported] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE
THEN ( -- contacts at the vendor can read (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND INT([Vendor RecordID]) FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- the primary vendor account can read (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND INT([Vendor RecordID]) FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 )
-- if the user is currently conducting an approval for this record, then they can read WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([To].[Assignee(s)]) AND [To].[Status] = 'Submitted' GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CASE -- Check if user is in role that can always read the contract record WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE
-- Check if current user is the originator and Contract setup is not yet complete WHEN [Setup Complete] <> TRUE AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Assignee] THEN TRUE
-- If the Contract is not restricted, check that the user is in a group that can read unrestricted records, or the same department as the record WHEN [Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' OR DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [Department]) ) THEN TRUE
-- Check if vendor access is enabled WHEN [Setup Complete] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 )
-- Check if current user is an approver listed on an in progress submission for the record or a child of it WHEN ( STEP TO [Submission] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND( ([To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract') OR ([To].[Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract') ) AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) THEN TRUE
-- return false if above requirements not met ELSE FALSE
END

CASE -- Check if user is in group that can read all records WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
-- Check if setup not yet complete and current user is originator WHEN [Setup Complete] <> TRUE AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is assigned to record WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE
-- Check if vendor access is enabled WHEN [Setup Complete] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 )
-- return false if above requirements not met ELSE FALSE
END

STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0
[Setup Complete] = TRUE

(STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

Settings.LandingViewFormula:
LET $roles := EBMS_GET_ANCESTOR_ROLES(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER());
RETURN IF( ARRAY_INDEXOF($roles, "Vendor Accounts") > 0, "Vendor",
[Setup Complete] <> TRUE, "Setup",
OR($requestedView = "Setup", $requestedView = NULL), "Summary",
COALESCE($requestedView, "Summary") )

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.FieldValuesFormula:
HASH(
"EFormType A", [EFormType], "RecordID A", [RecordID], "Description A", [Description],
"EFormType B", [Link EFormType], "RecordID B", [Link RecordID], "Description B", DB_LOOKUP("Description", [Link EFormType], HASH("RecordID", [Link RecordID]) ),
"Status", "Active"
)

Event.Name: Calculate Expenditure to Date
Event.Description: Sum of all purchase order receipt amount

Event.Name: Calculate Imported Variation Tax
Event.Description: Trigger on Contract import to calculate the tax value of imported variations. Assumes variations have same tax rate as Contract.

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Tax Mode] = "Percentage", IF([Tax Percent] = 0, 0, ([Imported Variation Value] / 100) * [Tax Percent]),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Imported Variation Tax] )
IF( [Date Contract Closed] < [Original End Date], [Date Contract Closed], [Original End Date] )

Event.Name: Create Extensions via Import
Event.Description: Uses the Imported Exercised Extension Period and Imported Extension Period fields to raise ONE extension per field (where value > 0) to capture the extension period.

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY("EFormType","RecordID"), "Extension", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1", HASH("parent", ARRAY("Contract", [RecordID])) )

HASH_GET($eventargs, "Previous Submission RecordID") //it will be null for the first roundof submission

RaiseLinkedEForm.Description: Generate new ID using RecordID to ensure uniqueness. Pushes the contract type onto the created record if unique type sequences are used.

RETURN $recordExists = NULL

RETURN $recordExists = NULL

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Register Selection Mode] = "Manual",
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Function], $(i, item) ARRAY_INDEXOF([Register Override], $item) > 0 ),
ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_TRANSPOSE([Temp]), 2) )

Event.Name: Get Prep Functions
Event.Description: gets functions enabled for preparation stage

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $array:= DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY( "Register", "Register Setup Task", "Register Setup Required" ), "Contract Type", "[Register] IS NOT EMPTY AND [Register Setup Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [RecordID] = " & [Contract Type RecordID] );
RETURN ARRAY_TO_HASH( $array, $(i,item) ARRAY_INDEX($item,1), $(i,item) ARRAY_SKIP($item,1) )

Event.Description: Refreshes the Action data displayed on the Contract Summary screen

FieldEntry.Formula: LET $line := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], "Contract Sponsor"); RETURN [Username in Role]#$line
LET $line := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], "Contract Manager"); RETURN [Username in Role]#$line
LET $line := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], "Contract Owner"); RETURN [Username in Role]#$line
LET $line := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], "Contract Sponsor"); RETURN [Individual Display Name in Role]#$line
LET $line := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], "Contract Manager"); RETURN [Individual Display Name in Role]#$line
LET $line := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], "Contract Owner"); RETURN [Individual Display Name in Role]#$line

Event.Name: Refresh Subcontract Data
Event.Description: Refreshes subcontract data displayed on the "Summary" screen (for Head Agreements)

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Set Current End Date (Required for Extensions)

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $data := ARRAY_TRANSPOSE( ARRAY( EACH [Extension Years], EACH [Extension Months], EACH [Extension Days], EACH [Extension Value], EACH [Extension Expiry] ) );
RETURN ARRAY_SELECTMANY( $data, $(i, item) ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(1, 1), $(e, extension) ARRAY( ARRAY_INDEX($item, 1), ARRAY_INDEX($item, 2), ARRAY_INDEX($item, 3), ARRAY_INDEX($item, 4), ARRAY_INDEX($item, 5) ) ) )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Refresh extensions - extension dates have dependencies on each other, and formulas need to get a refresh after creation

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Move to overview tab and set status to Active/Draft

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Raise Subcontracts (if Type is Head Agreement)
Update Subcontracts (if Type is Head Agreement) // Raised Via Integration
Update Information (for Head Agreement subcontract data)

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Check Type", [Business Number Type], "Business Number", [New Vendor BusinessNumber] )

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( OR( [Business Number Type] = "ABN", [Business Number Type] = "ACN" ), HASH_GET([ABR Data], "Entity Name") <> "",
[Valid Business Number] )

IF( OR( [Business Number Type] = "ABN", [Business Number Type] = "ACN" ), NOW(),
[Date Business Number Checked] )

FieldEntry.ColumnName: Approval to Initiate Contract Date Approved

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.FieldValuesFormula: LET $fields:= ARRAY( "Head Agreement RecordID", "Head Agreement Number", "Contract Number", "Subcontract Number" ); RETURN INDEXES_TO_KEYS( ARRAY( NULL, NULL, NULL, ARRAY(0) ), $fields )

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $estimate:= IF( [Procurement RecordID] <> NULL, DB_LOOKUP( "Estimated Value", "Procurement", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Procurement RecordID]) ) );
RETURN IF( AND( [Procurement RecordID] <> NULL, [Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] > $estimate ), "Award value exceeds the initial planned budget by " & NUMBERFORMAT([Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] - $estimate, "C") & " (Budgeted: " & NUMBERFORMAT($estimate, "C") & " | Actual: " & NUMBERFORMAT([Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax], "C") & ")" )

ChangeView.ViewNameFormula:
LET $hash := HASH( "Summary", "Summary", "Vendor", "Vendor Details", "Closure", "Closure", "Overview", "Default", "Tracking", "Registers", "Legal", "Registers" );
RETURN COALESCE( HASH_GET($hash, [Navigation]), "Registers" )

Event.Name: Tasks to Import Client Data
Event.Description: Triggered on Data Import to populate any additional data, assign roles, and raise extensions

ParentRecordFormula.RecordID: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Contract", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Contract Number] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Head Agreement Number]) )

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( ARRAY("Trading Name", "Business Number Type", "BusinessNumber", "Vendor ID"), "Vendor", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Vendor RecordID]) )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Create Extension via Import (Imported (Exercised) Extension Duration > 0)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: OR( [Imported Extension Period] > 0, [Imported Exercised Extension Period] > 0 )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Calculate Imported Variation Tax (Imported Variation Value > 0)

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Award Date Month] = NULL(), DATEFORMAT([Award Date], "MMMM"), [Award Date Month] )
IF( [Award Date Year] = NULL(), DATEFORMAT([Award Date], "yyyy"), [Award Date Year] )
COALESCE( IF( [Contract Type] <> NULL, DB_LOOKUP( "Second Party", "Contract Type", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Name] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract Type]) ) ), [Second Party] )

IF( [Tax Mode] = "Value", IF([Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] = 0, 0, [Tax] / [Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] * 100),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Tax Percent] )

IF( [Tax Mode] = "Percentage", IF([Tax Percent] = 0, 0, [Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] / 100 * [Tax Percent]),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Tax] )
[Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] + [Approved Variation Value] + [Approved Extension Value]
[Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] + [Tax] + [Approved Variation Value] + [Imported Variation Tax]
[Original End Date] + [Imported Exercised Extension Period] + [Imported Extension Period]
IF( [Contract Number] <> NULL, [Contract Number] & " - " ) & [Contract Title] & IF( NOT(ISBLANK([Vendor RecordID])), " (" & [Vendor Name] & ")" )
DB_LOOKUP( "Name", "Contract Type", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract Type RecordID]) )
IF( [Contract Number] <> NULL, [Contract Number] & " - " ) & [Contract Title] & IF( NOT(ISBLANK([Vendor RecordID])), " (" & [Vendor Name] & ")" )

Event.Name: Update Financials
Event.Description: Updates various fields relating to financial data. Recalculates Extension Data to allow Contract Value & Status to update correctly when exercised.

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Tax Mode] = "Value", IF([Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] = 0, 0, [Tax] / [Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] * 100),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Tax Percent] )

IF( [Tax Mode] = "Percentage", IF([Tax Percent] = 0, 0, [Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] / 100 * [Tax Percent]),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Tax] )
HASH_GET([Variation Data], "Total Variation Value incl Tax")
SUM( HASH_GET([Variation Data], "Total Approved Variation Value excl Tax"), [Imported Variation Value] )
[Approved Variation Value] + HASH_GET([Variation Data], "Total Approved Tax") + [Imported Variation Tax]
HASH_GET([Extension Data], "Total Extension Value incl Tax")
HASH_GET([Extension Data], "Total Exercised Extension Value excl Tax")
HASH_GET([Extension Data], "Total Exercised Extension Value incl Tax")
[Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] + [Approved Variation Value] + [Approved Extension Value]

[Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax] + [Tax] + HASH_GET([Extension Data], "Total Exercised Extension Value incl Tax") + [Approved Variation Value] + HASH_GET([Variation Data], "Total Approved Tax") + [Imported Variation Tax]

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND( HASH_GET([Global Settings], "Owns Integrated Module - Purchase Orders") == TRUE, HASH_GET([Contract Module Settings], "Auto-Populate Expenditure to Date") == TRUE )

Event.Name: Update Individual Role Allocation
Event.Description: Triggered on close of Change of Role form

FieldEntry.LineNumberFormula: ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], HASH_GET($eventargs, "Role"))
ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], HASH_GET($eventargs, "Role"))

FieldEntry.ColumnName: Role is not a System User
FieldEntry.LineNumberFormula: ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], HASH_GET($eventargs, "Role"))
FieldEntry.Formula: HASH_GET($eventargs, "Role is not a System User")

FieldEntry.LineNumberFormula: ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], HASH_GET($eventargs, "Role"))

Event.Name: Update Information
Event.Description: Event to run to fill in formulas for items that may have missed timing based to being imported. May also be applicable if fields were many updating in some unexpected case e.g. dev console set a field

Event.Name: Update Miscellaneous Data
Event.Description: Refreshes various date and descriptive fields, e.g. Current End Date, Status, and Source

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Award Date Month] = NULL(), DATEFORMAT([Award Date], "MMMM"), [Award Date Month] )
IF( [Award Date Year] = NULL(), DATEFORMAT([Award Date], "yyyy"), [Award Date Year] )
COALESCE( IF( [Contract Type] <> NULL, DB_LOOKUP( "Second Party", "Contract Type", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Name] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract Type]) ) ), [Second Party] )

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.TargetRecordsFormula: ARRAY_SELECT( ARRAY_WHERE( EACH[Subcontract RecordID], $(i, item) $item <> NULL()), $(j, jtem) ARRAY("Contract", $jtem) )

Event.Name: Update Vendor Data
Event.Description: Updates vendor contact and compliance data on contract, as well as vendor details if enabled

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $columns := ARRAY( "URL", "Name", "Email Address" ); LET $data := ARRAY_CONCAT( EBMS_GET_EFORMRECORD_URL("Contact", ARRAY_FIRST([Contact RecordIDs])), DB_LOOKUP( ARRAY_SKIP($columns, 1), "Contact", "[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(ARRAY_FIRST([Contact RecordIDs])) ) );
RETURN IF(ARRAY_FIRST([Contact RecordIDs]) <> NULL, ARRAY(INDEXES_TO_KEYS($data, $columns)),NULL())

DB_LOOKUP( ARRAY("Company Name", "BusinessNumber", "Business Number Type", "Vendor ID"), "Vendor", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Vendor RecordID]) )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Sync Vendor Details (if Automatically Update Vendor Details is enabled)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: HASH_GET([Contract Module Settings], "Automatically Update Vendor Details") == TRUE

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "Vendor ID", "Vendor", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(N([Vendor RecordID])) )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Sync Vendor ID (if Automatically Update Vendor Details is disabled)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: HASH_GET([Contract Module Settings], "Automatically Update Vendor Details") <> TRUE

Event.Name: Wizard - Validate Setup Data
Event.Description: Triggered prior to submission/finalisation to ensure all required information has been populated
